items.name: Mahatma Gandhi
items.detail: Leader of Indian independence movement known for non-violence.

items.name: Subhash Chandra Bose
items.detail: Leader of Indian National Army and independence activist.

items.name: Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel
items.detail: Iron Man of India, unified the princely states.

items.name: Dr. B. R. Ambedkar
items.detail: Principal architect of the Indian Constitution.

items.name: APJ Abdul Kalam
items.detail: Former President and scientist known as the Missile Man of India.

items.name: Indira Gandhi
items.detail: First and only female Prime Minister of India.

items.name: Lal Bahadur Shastri
items.detail: Second Prime Minister of India known for 'Jai Jawan Jai Kisan'.
